name: Grave Robbing
description:
Pillage corpses and buy grimoires to increase your magic power (on your phone because it is current year), but be prepared to pay the price for disturbing the undead!

Recommended to play fullscreen, windows probably has better performance too

WASD / arrow keys to move, space to jump

click to shoot

ESC/P to pause / buy upgrades

shift/ctrl to dash, press again to interrupt

Made for Juice Jam II.

Art, Programming, SFX, music - orz, + some misc stuff I downloaded

Tileset Credit:

https://kenney.nl/assets/abstract-platformer
